creator: spam@nebol.dyndns.org
text:
The log-paths set in my configfile were invalid, and this is what Apache told 
me:
The Apache service is starting.
Failed to start the Apache service.
Note the errors or messages above, and press the <ESC> key to exit.  25...

That's not very informative. An explanation like "could not create log file in 
k:\temp\access.log - path not found" would've helped a lot.
